About Me

Hey there! I'm Parker Jo Hurd, a whimsical dreamer from the enchanting town of Kingsport, TN. Right now, I'm diving headfirst into the incredible journey of higher education at ETSU in Johnson City. As I pursue my passion for helping others, my sights are set on becoming an Occupational Therapist, making a positive impact in people's lives.

When I'm seeking moments of tranquility, you'll often find me curled up in a cozy nook, surrounded by a treasure trove of books. Reading is my escape, my gateway to magical realms and captivating stories. Within those pages, I discover new perspectives, expand my horizons, and get lost in the beauty of literature. It's a journey of the mind that nourishes my soul.

Speaking of inspiration, my home is a bustling sanctuary of feline enchantment. Sharing my indoor and outdoor space with twelve lovable cats has transformed my surroundings into a whimsical wonderland. Their playful antics and unconditional love brighten every moment of my life, creating a joyful haven where laughter and purrs mingle harmoniously.

So come, join me on this adventure as I weave the threads of my dreams, embracing the artistic, feline-filled, book-devouring chapters of my life. Together, let's paint the canvas of our existence with vibrant colors and unforgettable experiences!
